quotes.quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
Reflect upon your present blessings of which every man has many not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
If I speak of myself in different ways, that is because I look at myself in different ways.
Sometimes, you have to look back in order to understand the things that lie ahead.
Each person you meet is an aspect of yourself, clamoring for love.
Living in a way that reflects one's values is not just about what you do, it is also about how you do things.
Learning without reflection is a waste. Reflection without learning is dangerous.
There is no future without a past, because what is to be cannot be imagined except as a form of repetition.
You are a mirror of yourself in others. Whatever you want, give. Be the best reflection of yourself.
Follow effective action with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
Without deep reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.
Our language is the reflection of ourselves.
Time and reflection change the sight little by little 'till we come to understand.
Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
People of the world don't look at themselves, and so they blame one another.
Love your Enemies, for they tell you your Faults.
It is a most mortifying reflection for a man to consider what he has done, compared to what he might have done.
Detached reflection cannot be demanded in the presence of an uplifted knife.
One can not reflect in streaming water. Only those who know internal peace can give it to others.
Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
Everyone and everything that shows up in our life is a reflection of something that is happening inside of us.
The more peace we have within our own lives, the more we can reflect into the outer world.
A soul without reflection, like a pile Without inhabitant, to ruin runs.
Sometimes you have to take a break and breathe before you can keep moving forward.
The way we experience the world around us is a direct reflection of the world within us.
If you don't know what you are doing wrong, you can never know what you are doing right.
Sometimes you have to take a half step back to take two forward.
Who apart from ourselves, can see any difference between our victories and our defeats?
If we are to go forward, we must go back and rediscover those precious values – that all reality hinges on moral foundations, and that all reality has spiritual control.
All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
